title: Lost & Found, Part 1
synopsis: A group of young aliens find a derelict Starfleet ship and must learn how to operate it to escape their captors.

title: Lost & Found, Part 2
synopsis: The crew continues to learn about their new ship as they navigate their way through uncharted space.

title: Starstruck
synopsis: The crew encounters their first major challenge when they encounter an anomaly in space.

title: Dreamcatcher
synopsis: The crew investigates a mysterious planet that taps into their deepest desires and fears.

title: Terror Firma
synopsis: The crew must work together to escape the planet's grasp and get back on course.

title: Kobayashi
synopsis: Dal takes the captain's chair to try his hand at the infamous Kobayashi Maru scenario.

title: First Con-tact
synopsis: The crew encounters a Ferengi who has a complicated history with one of their own.

title: Time Amok
synopsis: The crew must work together across different time periods to save their ship.

title: A Moral Star, Part 1
synopsis: The crew makes a daring plan to rescue their captured friends and reclaim their ship.

title: A Moral Star, Part 2
synopsis: The crew faces off against the Diviner in a final showdown to secure their freedom.

title: Asylum
synopsis: The crew seeks asylum at a Federation outpost, but their plans are complicated by the Diviner's pursuit.

title: Let Sleeping Borg Lie
synopsis: The crew encounters a dormant Borg cube and must navigate its dangers to secure vital information.

title: All the World's a Stage
synopsis: The crew discovers a planet where the inhabitants have modeled their entire society on a Starfleet mission.

title: Crossroads
synopsis: The crew faces difficult choices as they encounter familiar faces from Starfleet and the Diviner's forces.

title: Masquerade
synopsis: Dal confronts his past and his identity while the crew tries to stay ahead of the Diviner.

title: Preludes
synopsis: The crew learns more about each other's backgrounds as they prepare for their next move.

title: Ghost in the Machine
synopsis: The crew faces a mysterious threat that challenges their trust in each other and their ship.

title: Mindwalk
synopsis: An accident causes Dal and Admiral Janeway to swap bodies, complicating their mission.

title: Supernova, Part 1
synopsis: The crew faces an overwhelming threat as the Diviner's plan reaches its climax.

title: Supernova, Part 2
synopsis: In the season finale, the crew makes a last stand to save the galaxy and secure their future.
